entityName: United States Commodity Index Funds Trust

EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties.

AccruedFeesAndOtherRevenueReceivable.label: Accrued Fees and Other Revenue Receivable
AccruedFeesAndOtherRevenueReceivable.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, the amount of fees and other revenue, excluding investment income receivable, earned but not yet received, which were recognized in conformity with revenue recognition criteria based on estimates or specific contractual terms.

AccruedInvestmentIncomeReceivable.label: Accrued Investment Income Receivable
AccruedInvestmentIncomeReceivable.description: Interest, dividends, rents, ancillary and other revenues earned but not yet received by the entity on its investments.

AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrentAndNoncurr.label: Accrued Professional Fees
AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrentAndNoncurr.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received.

AssetManagementCosts.label: Asset Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
AssetManagementCosts.description: The aggregate costs related to asset management during the reporting period.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

CapitalUnitsOutstanding.label: Capital Units, Outstanding
CapitalUnitsOutstanding.description: Number of capital units or capital shares outstanding. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommissionsPayableToBrokerDealersAndClea.label: Commissions Payable to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
CommissionsPayableToBrokerDealersAndClea.description: Amount payable to broker-dealers or clearing organizations for executing or clearing trades or orders.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.description: Contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

DividendIncomeOperating.label: Dividend Income, Operating
DividendIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating dividend income on securities.

DividendsReceivable.label: Dividends Receivable
DividendsReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but not received.

DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due from Related Parties, Current
DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: The aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due within one year (or one business cycle).

DueToOfficersOrStockholdersCurrentAndNon.label: Due to Officers or Stockholders
DueToOfficersOrStockholdersCurrentAndNon.description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company.

DueToOtherRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncur.label: Due to Other Related Parties
DueToOtherRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncur.description: Amount payable to related parties classified as other.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.label: Floor Brokerage, Exchange and Clearance Fees
FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossRealiz.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), Realized
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossRealiz.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnreal.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), Unrealized
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnreal.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties and Interest Expense
IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.description: The sum of the amounts of estimated penalties and interest recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

IncreaseDecreaseDueFromOfficersAndStockh.label: Increase (Decrease) Due from Officers and Stockholders
IncreaseDecreaseDueFromOfficersAndStockh.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from the reporting entity's executives and owners.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts and Other Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; includes accounts receivable and other types of receivables.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRela.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRela.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to the reporting entity for good and services provided to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInBrokerDealerRelatedRec.label: Increase (Decrease) in Broker-Dealer Related Receivables (Payables), Net
IncreaseDecreaseInBrokerDealerRelatedRec.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables or payables that result from buying and selling securities for the firm's own account or from acting as an agent or intermediary in the sale of securities.

IncreaseDecreaseInDividendsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Dividends Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInDividendsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in cash disbursements due from investments, representing the shareholders' portion of profits.

IncreaseDecreaseInFinancialInstrumentsUs.label: Increase (Decrease) in Financial Instruments Used in Operating Activities
IncreaseDecreaseInFinancialInstrumentsUs.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of financial instruments used in operating activities, including trading securities, risk management instruments, and other short-term trading instruments.

IncreaseDecreaseInInsuranceLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Insurance Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInInsuranceLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) in insurance liability balances during the period.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilitie.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilitie.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToBrokerDealer.label: Increase (Decrease) in Payables to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToBrokerDealer.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations incurred arising from transactions with broker-dealers, such as amounts due on margin and unsettled cash transactions; includes payables to brokers, dealers and clearing organizations.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidInsurance.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Insurance
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidInsurance.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits in future periods.

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.label: Investment Owned, at Fair Value
InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.description: Value of the investment at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, the value would be aggregated by category. For investment in and advances to affiliates, if operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates within divisions and by type of activities.

InvestmentOwnedBalanceContracts.label: Investment Owned, Balance, Contracts
InvestmentOwnedBalanceContracts.description: Balance held at close of period in number of contracts.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

ManagementFeeExpense.label: Management Fee Expense
ManagementFeeExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NoninterestExpenseDirectorsFees.label: Noninterest Expense Directors Fees
NoninterestExpenseDirectorsFees.description: Noninterest expense related to directors' fees which are fees paid by an Entity to its directors. Directors' fees may be paid in addition to salary and other benefits.

NoninterestExpenseTransferAgentAndCustod.label: Noninterest Expense Transfer Agent and Custodian Fees
NoninterestExpenseTransferAgentAndCustod.description: Fees paid to an agent employed by a corporation or mutual fund to maintain shareholder records, including purchases, sales, and account balances. Also includes custodian fees incurred during an accounting period from an agent, bank, trust company, or other organization that holds and safeguards an individual's, mutual fund's, or investment company's assets for them. These fees will be billed back to the client and are a component of noninterest expense.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurr.label: Other Accrued Liabilities
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurr.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.label: Partners' Capital Account, Exchanges and Conversions
PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to exchanges and conversions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountReturnOfCapital.label: Partners' Capital Account, Return of Capital
PartnersCapitalAccountReturnOfCapital.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the return of partner's capital. That is, excess distributions over earnings to partners. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsContributed.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Contributed
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsContributed.description: Units contributed by each class of partners during the year. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Redeemed
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed.description: The number of units redeemed during the year of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PrepaidInsurance.label: Prepaid Insurance
PrepaidInsurance.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.label: Proceeds from Partnership Contribution
ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.description: The cash inflow from the capital received in cash from a partner in a partnership during the period.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

TradingGainsLosses.label: Trading Gain (Loss)
TradingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) resulting from the difference between the acquisition price and the selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, conducted separately from customer trading activities. Includes, but is not limited to, changes in fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities.

TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Trading Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of gain (loss) realized from securities classified as trading.

TrusteeFees.label: Trustee Fees
TrusteeFees.description: Fees charged annually for the professional services of a trustee, usually quoted as a percentage of the funds being managed. The fee for appointing an offshore Trustee is included in the trust price.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives and Commodity Contracts
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open derivatives, commodity, or energy contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Securities
UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement on unsold other securities.
